channel.title: Command to tell you your current Coordinates?
channel.description:
I'm still getting used to how these servers are set up, and it would be extremely helpful if I had a command that would tell me the coordinates I was currently at.
Thanks again,
Foruder

item.title: Command to tell you your current Coordinates?
item.dc:creator: @Foruder Foruder
item.description:
@Foruder wrote:

[quote=“x blitz x, post:2, topic:256032”] if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("mypos")) { sendMessage("X: " + absX); sendMessage("Y: " + absY); } [/quote]

Thanks x blitz x

Read full topic
item.source: Command to tell you your current Coordinates?

item.title: Command to tell you your current Coordinates?
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("mypos")) {
    sendMessage("X: " + absX);
    sendMessage("Y: " + absY); 
}

Read full topic
